I am a writer.
I try to go hunting with my brothers several times a year.

content.text: I'm a writer too! What kind of things do you like to write?
I like to write fiction, mostly. I also write some short stories, but my main focus is on novels.
That's really cool! I've always been more interested in nonfiction writing, but I've been trying to branch out into fiction more recently.
I think it's important to experiment with different types of writing. It helps you to become a more well-rounded writer.
I agree! I'm still learning, but I'm having a lot of fun with it.
That's great! What are some of your favorite books?
I love the Twilight series by Stephenie Meyer. I also love the Harry Potter series by J.K. Rowling.
I've read both of those series! They're both really great.
I know, right? I'm a big fan of both of them.
So, what do you do for fun when you're not writing?
I like to go hiking, biking, and camping. I also like to play video games and watch movies.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I like to do some of those things too.
Yeah, they're great ways to relax and have fun.
I agree! So, what are some of your favorite video games?
I love the Legend of Zelda series. I also love the Mario series.
I've played some of those games before. They're really fun.
I know, right? They're some of my favorite games.
So, what are some of your favorite movies?
I love the Lord of the Rings trilogy. I also love the Harry Potter movies.
I've seen both of those movies! They're both really great.
I know, right? They're some of my favorite movies.
So, what do you do for work?
I'm a teacher at a local elementary school.
That's really cool! I've always thought about being a teacher.
It's a great job! I love working with kids.
I can imagine! It must be really rewarding.
It is! I love seeing the difference I make in their lives.
